title: Add username 'turbohunter64' to admin whitelist

requirements.text: Add the username 'turbohunter64' to the backend admin username whitelist alongside the existing 'venomgladiator25' username

quotes: Add the user name Saint to the admin list

acceptanceCriteria: The backend admin whitelist contains both 'venomgladiator25' and 'turbohunter64'
When a user with username 'turbohunter64' clicks the admin button on the storefront, they receive admin panel access
The isAdminUsername backend endpoint returns true for 'turbohunter64'
The whitelist persists across canister upgrades through the migration.mo module

constraints: Do not remove the existing 'venomgladiator25' admin username
Maintain the existing username-based whitelist system (do not implement ID-based system)
Ensure the migration.mo module includes both admin usernames for upgrade persistence
nonGoals: Replacing username-based whitelist with ID-based whitelist
Adding UI for admins to manage the whitelist
